content:
Sure, here's the Known Fact tweet table for movies 1-5:

| # | Name | Tweet | Hashtags |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | Blackmail | Hitchcock's first sound film, "Blackmail," is a thrilling crime drama that explores the consequences of a terrible mistake. With its striking visuals and suspenseful score, it remains a classic of early sound cinema. What's your favorite scene? 🎥 | #Blackmail #Hitchcock #EarlySoundCinema #CrimeDrama #Suspense #ClassicFilm |
| 2 | The Man Who Knew Too Much | In Hitchcock's "The Man Who Knew Too Much," an ordinary couple become entangled in a web of international intrigue and assassination. With its thrilling set pieces and memorable score, this classic film keeps you on the edge of your seat. What's your favorite moment? 🔍 | #TheManWhoKnewTooMuch #Hitchcock #Thriller #Assassination #ClassicFilm |
| 3 | The 39 Steps | "The 39 Steps" is a suspenseful espionage thriller that follows an innocent man who is falsely accused of murder. With its iconic set pieces and memorable characters, it remains a quintessential Hitchcock film. What's your favorite moment? 🕵️‍♂️ | #The39Steps #Hitchcock #EspionageThriller #Suspense #ClassicFilm |
| 4 | The Lady Vanishes | "The Lady Vanishes" is a witty and suspenseful mystery that follows a young woman's search for a missing elderly passenger on a train. With its memorable characters and thrilling climax, it remains a favorite of Hitchcock fans. What's your favorite scene? 🕵️‍♀️ | #TheLadyVanishes #Hitchcock #Mystery #Suspense #ClassicFilm |
| 5 | Rebecca | Hitchcock's "Rebecca" is a haunting and atmospheric tale of love and jealousy, set against the backdrop of a grand English estate. With its superb performances and stunning visuals, it remains one of the most beloved films of his career. What's your favorite moment? 🏰 | #Rebecca #Hitchcock #Atmospheric #Drama #Suspense #ClassicFilm |
